Journal Story: I plan to do a flip flop hike starting on April 20 2020 at Harper's Ferry Wva. north and flipping south to Springer Mtn.I like the longer period of time to complete and the less severe temps. I also like to explore along the way and enjoy History and stopping along the way.

Having turned 62 I have decided to retire early. Social Security to me is like hitting the lotto with a guaranteed income for the rest of my life.
I thank God for bringing me this far and letting me go on this adventure.
I have always loved the AT and have day hiked numerous times and am more enchanted every time I go.
I am starting to prepare way early but will be hiking local trails in preparation for the big one.

My biggest concern are the caloses that I have on the bottom of my toes. They are like points having been smashed from standing on concrete floors in hot factories for many years. They can be painful to walk on and I am looking for any possible solutions. Though I am always apprehensive of any surgeries.
